subject: Wimbledon Tennis Tournament
Tennis
Grass
lead_paragraph: Groundskeepers realize not much can be done to improve a court’s appearance by this stage at Wimbledon, so ever-expanding blotches remain at the baselines.
snippet: Groundskeepers realize not much can be done to improve a court’s appearance by this stage at Wimbledon, so ever-expanding blotches remain at the baselines.
